column4: Contact is the label of a button in the Uber Driver app UI which enables the user to call or text the rider.
In our customer support platform, Bliss, each support ticket is called a contact.
This refers to a person whose information, such as ID or email address, has been added by the user to their contact list or to an address book.
People who sign up to drive on the Uber platform.
column6: Generally, we refer to drivers using the Uber platform as "driver-partners".

column4: People who sign up to drive on the Uber platform.
Used Airbnb Plus value prop; each home in Airbnb Plus is verified for quality and design.
column6: Quality should always come before the word design in these value props.
column7: These houses are verified for quality and design
column8: verificado por su calidad y diseño
column10: Estas casas se han verificado por su calidad y diseño
column12: "qualità" va sempre messo prima di "design" quando si utilizza quest'epressione
column13: Queste case sono state verificate per qualità e design

column4: Guidelines on Uber's use for all of our community
Guidelines on Uber's use for all of our community
column9: In Spanish, never use an acronym to translate "Community Guidelines"
column12: Acronimo per "Linee guida della community". Alla prima occorrenza nel testo target, aggiungere "(Linee guida della community)" dopo l'acronimo.
